content: this crochet tee is a versatile garment designed to be customized to your exact measurements this pattern is made to measure so you don t need to obtain any gauge it can be made with any yarn and hook that you desire the design is beginner-friendly making it a great option for those new to crochet you can customize the length fit relaxed or fitted and color to suit your preferences for my version i used hobbii - friends cotton 8/6 in colors oatmilk 03 and cappuccino 10 my size m uses a total of 450g of yarn which is approximately 9 skeins about 70% of the yarn is color a oatmilk and 30% is color b cappuccino this amounts to roughly 945 meters 1 035 yards of yarn in total for any questions please feel free to contact me via instagram @kajcyika crochet
